hero.title: Automate Your Website Growth with AI-Powered SEO
hero.description: At Boostifai, we help businesses of all sizes grow their online presence with smart, automated SEO solutions—boosting rankings, creating optimized content, and saving time, all without any technical hassle.

features.title: AI-powered SEO that runs on autopilot
features.description: Smart recommendations, automated blogs, and continuous optimization—all in one platform. Automate SEO tasks with Boostifai and focus on your business.
features.feature1Description: Boostifai continuously scans your pages and delivers smart SEO suggestions—meta tags, headings, images, and internal links—ready for one-click approval.
features.feature2Description: Connect your pages naturally with AI-driven internal links that strengthen site structure and boost keyword rankings
features.feature3Description: Access a complete suite of SEO tools—from audits to analytics—built to enhance visibility and drive consistent organic growth
features.feature4Description: Our AI generates optimized blog posts around your focus keywords and publishes them directly to your CMS—fresh, relevant, and SEO-ready content on autopilot.

howItWorks.title: From install to traffic boost in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.step1Description: Add the Boostifai pixel to your site in minutes—no coding required.
howItWorks.step2Description: Check AI-powered SEO suggestions and approve them with a single click.
howItWorks.step3Description: Watch your website rise as Boostifai automatically improves your rankings in real time.

services.title: Key Benefits of boostifai
services.description: Automate your SEO with AI-powered tools that work 24/7. Save time and boost rankings
services.service1Description: Generates niche-relevant blog posts tailored to your business. Fresh, engaging content without any effort.
services.service2Description: Real-time insights into your website's Google rankings. Monitor performance and make informed decisions that boost visibility.
services.service3Description: Strategic link building to improve visibility. Internal links help Google rank your site higher, attracting organic traffic.
services.service4Description: Intelligent recommendations powered by AI. Understand what works and receive actionable insights to improve your SEO strategy.
services.service5Description: AI tools work behind the scenes to rank your website higher. Easily implement without technical knowledge. Works with any CMS.
services.service6Description: Reduce ad spend by growing visibility organically. Achieve more with less investment through automated solutions.

questions.question: Do I need technical skills to use Boostifai?
questions.answer: No technical expertise is required. Installation is simple with a one-line code snippet, and AI-driven recommendations can be approved with a single click. Boostifai handles all the SEO automation for you.

questions.question: How does Boostifai improve my website's SEO?
questions.answer: Boostifai continuously analyzes your site and applies AI-driven recommendations—like optimized meta tags, headings, internal links, and blog content—directly to your pages. This automation helps boost your Google rankings and attract more organic traffic without manual effort.

questions.question: How long before I see results?
questions.answer: While immediate results can vary, most users see measurable improvements in rankings and traffic within 1–3 months, depending on competition and backlink profiles. Boostifai provides reports each month to track your progress.

questions.question: Can I use Boostifai with my CMS?
questions.answer: Yes, it works for all CMS systems. Even if you have a CMS where it is normally difficult to make code changes, Boostifai can optimize your site for SEO. As long as you can add our one-line code snippet to your site, Boostifai will add the improvements.

questions.question: Does Boostifai support multiple languages?
questions.answer: Yes! Boostifai supports SEO optimization in various languages for your website content. However, domains with non-Roman characters (like .рф or .中国) are currently not supported.

questions.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
questions.answer: Yes! Boostifai offers a 7-day money-back guarantee. You can try the platform risk-free and see if it meets your SEO needs. If not satisfied, you can request a full refund within the 7-day period.

agencies.question: How does Boostifai stand out from other SEO tools? What are the differences?
agencies.answer: Unlike traditional SEO tools that provide checklists and recommendations, Boostifai performs real-time adjustments directly on your website. This means faster implementation of SEO strategies, immediate optimization of content, and a significant reduction in manual work. Including content generation, meta tag management, keyword analysis, link building, adding blogs, and real-time on-page SEO adjustments directly within webpages.

agencies.question: How does Boostifai integrate with our existing CMS platforms?
agencies.answer: Boostifai is designed to seamlessly integrate with a wide range of CMS platforms. Our automated solutions can be activated with a single line of code, ensuring that optimizations are applied directly to your client's website. Check out this page for the easy set up process: https://www.boostifai.com/how-it-works/

agencies.question: What are the main features of Boostifai?
agencies.answer: Boostifai offers automated SEO optimizations, including content generation, meta tag management, keyword analysis, and real-time on-page SEO adjustments directly within webpages.

agencies.question: How does Boostifai improve SEO performance?
agencies.answer:
Boostifai enhances SEO performance by automating tasks that improve website visibility, organic search rankings by creating blogs, backlinks and on-page SEO. Boostifai distinguishes itself from conventional SEO tools that operate at surface level, by facilitating on-page SEO improvements directly within website pages, ensuring immediate optimization of content, meta tags, and other essential elements on the client's site. This real-time capability provides integrated optimizations seamlessly to drive rapid results and enhance client satisfaction.

Blog features:
- Efficient content production: Automatically generated niche-relevant articles tailored to your clients' industries.
- Enhanced client engagement: Topically relevant content that keeps your clients' audiences engaged and informed.
- Professional imagery: Utilize niche-relevant featured and in-article images to enhance the visual appeal of your clients' blogs.
- Optimized structure: Ensure all articles have well-structured headings for better readability and SEO performance.
- Custom call-to-actions: Drive traffic to your clients' businesses with strategically placed external links and custom CTAs.
- Seamless automation: Automate the entire content generation and posting process, freeing up your team to focus on more strategic tasks.

agencies.question: How does Boostifai handle algorithm changes from search engines?
agencies.answer: Boostifai updates its engine based on search engine algorithm. Our features are regularly updated to adapt to search engine algorithm changes and industry best practices.

agencies.question: Is Boostifai compatible with multiple languages?
agencies.answer: Yes, Boostifai supports many languages. However, at this time, we do NOT support domains with characters from non-Roman alphabets. That means no TLDs such as .рф, .中国, .みんな and others. If you need support for these domains, please message us. We might add them in the future.

agencies.question: Does Boostifai provide reporting?
agencies.answer: Yes, Boostifai generates detailed analytics and performance reports to track SEO progress and identify areas for improvement. Deliver branded SEO reports to your clients. We generate and review SEO performance reports to track progress and identify areas for improvement.

agencies.question: What types of businesses benefit most from Boostifai?
agencies.answer: Boostifai is beneficial for agencies, businesses, and e-commerce sites looking to optimize their online presence and drive growth through improved SEO practices.

agencies.question: How does Boostifai help agencies?
agencies.answer: Boostifai automates time-consuming SEO tasks such as keyword research, content generation, and meta tag optimization. By handling these tasks automatically, your team can focus on higher-level strategic initiatives and creative projects, enhancing overall efficiency. To discover how we can help your agency, plan a strategy call at https://www.boostifai.com/demo-strategy/

whatIsBoostifai.title: What is Boostifai?
whatIsBoostifai.description: Boostifai is a company with focus on helping business owners and agencies with their marketing challenges:
whatIsBoostifai.card1Description: A gut feeling is good, but data never lies. We offer data-driven solutions that help our customers make well-founded business decisions.
whatIsBoostifai.card2Description: We believe entrepreneurs and companies should be able to focus on their core business. Automation creates stability and continuity while saving time.
whatIsBoostifai.card3Description: Our customers are ambitious and so are we. We keep pushing ourselves to finetune our products and create new ones. Making the lives of our customers easier is what drives us every day.

benefits.title: Benefits of our affiliate program
benefits.benefit1Description: Earn substantial commissions on every sale you refer. The more you promote, the more you earn!
benefits.benefit2Description: Boostifai's user-friendly design and powerful features make it an easy sell. Watch your referrals convert effortlessly.
benefits.benefit3Description: Access a wealth of marketing resources, including banners, email templates, and detailed guides, to help you succeed.
benefits.benefit4Description: Keep track of your referrals and commissions with our transparent, real-time tracking system.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How does the affiliate program work?
faq.answer1: As a Boostifai affiliate, you'll earn commissions by promoting our SEO tool. Share your unique affiliate link, and earn a commission for every sale made through your link.
faq.question2: What resources are available to affiliates?
faq.answer2: Affiliates have access to a variety of marketing resources, including banners, email templates, and promotional guides to help you succeed.
faq.answer3: Boostifai is an automated SEO tool designed to help businesses attract more customers and increase their profits with minimal effort. It requires no coding and eliminates the need for complex checklists.
faq.answer4: Commissions are paid out monthly via your chosen payment method, once you reach the minimum payout threshold.

hero.title: AI-powered SEO solution for businesses and agencies
hero.description: Learn about our mission, story, and team. We are committed to revolutionizing SEO for business owners and agencies through innovative AI technology.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph1: At Boostifai, our mission is to empower business owners and agencies with innovative AI-driven SEO to revolutionize their digital marketing. Our solution elevates online visibility and drives sustainable growth by automating SEO processes. Boostifai leverages advanced AI technology to automate SEO and enhance website performance effortlessly.
mission.paragraph2: We empower business owners to focus on strategic growth and creative pursuits by automating the technical aspects of SEO. Boostifai enhances your online presence effortlessly, ensuring improved visibility and attracting more visitors without requiring technical skills.
mission.paragraph3: We enable agencies to focus on strategic initiatives and creative endeavors, enhancing client satisfaction and fostering long-term partnerships. Our goal is to be the trusted partner that agencies rely on to deliver exceptional results, achieve marketing goals, and stay ahead in the competitive landscape of digital marketing.

story.title: Our story
story.intro: Bert Vissers, owner of Webshopcompany since 2008:
story.paragraph1: 20 years ago I graduated as an application engineer with a passion for e-commerce. Over the years, I have built many websites, webshops and apps. I realized many clients struggled with online visibility and website traffic.
story.paragraph2: Driven by a passion for innovation and a deep understanding of the online world, I worked towards a transformation of SEO practices. My vision is to develop an automated AI solution that helps business owners to focus on their true passion and that helps agencies to concentrate more on strategy, creativity and client relationships.
story.paragraph3: As an AI business architect, I work with a dedicated team of AI experts to develop a powerful AI-driven solution. Unlike traditional SEO tools that only provide checklists, Boostifai stands out by allowing direct changes within webpages. Our solution enables immediate optimization of content, meta tags, and other important elements directly on the website.
story.paragraph4: This real-time capability shows our commitment to delivering faster results and higher client satisfaction, contrasting with competitors who rely on manual adjustments, hours of investigation and implementation of changes given by external checklists.
story.paragraph5: Boostifai can be activated with one line of code and requires no technical expertise. It simplifies operations through automation, reduces ad spend by boosting organic SEO growth, and provides detailed reporting with actionable insights of the progression. Experience the transformative power of Boostifai.

steps.title: Simple 3-step setup to start boosting your website immediately
steps.step1Description: Subscribe now and receive the code snippet. Don't worry, you don't need to be a tech wizard to install the software, a simple copy-paste will do!
steps.step2Description: Review the improved suggestions and approve them with one simple click. Want to make adjustments to the suggestions? No problem, you can simply discard or change them. Boostifai will implement the approved suggestions automatically, so sit back and relax.
steps.step3Description: With all these automated suggestions, you don't want to sit around and wait. You want results immediately. Track real-time how our AI tool improves your page ranking in Google. Let's go! Now, you are ready to experience what Boostifai can do for your business!

benefits.title: Now, you are ready to experience what Boostifai can do for your business!
benefits.description: With Boostifai's AI-powered SEO automation, you'll see real results in your Google rankings. Our intelligent system continuously optimizes your website, so you can focus on growing your business while we handle the technical SEO work.
benefits.benefit1Description: Our advanced AI analyzes your website and generates smart SEO recommendations tailored to your content, helping you rank higher in search results automatically.
benefits.benefit2Description: Monitor your website's performance with our intuitive dashboard. Track keyword rankings, traffic growth, and SEO improvements in real-time.
benefits.benefit3Description: Boostifai works 24/7 to keep your SEO optimized. As search algorithms evolve, our AI adapts your strategy to maintain and improve your rankings.

features.title: 5 Free Automated Articles + AI Blog Creator for Unlimited Articles
features.subtitle: Get 5 blog posts free per month
features.description: Maintaining an active blog is key to driving traffic and improving your SEO, but it can also be time-consuming. That's why we offer 5 free, fully optimized blog posts every month as part of our service. With our AI-powered tool, you'll never have to worry about content creation again.
features.feature1Description: Choose your own topics or let our AI suggest trending ones based on your industry.
features.feature2Description: Every post is crafted with the latest SEO practices, ensuring your website ranks higher and attracts more visitors.
features.feature3Description: Publish directly to your CMS with just one click or save the posts as drafts for review.
features.unlimitedTitle: Plus, unlimited new blog posts with our AI Blog Creator
features.unlimitedDescription: Writing blog posts doesn't have to be time-consuming. With our AI-powered tool, you can generate fresh, SEO-optimized content in seconds. Here's how it works:
features.step1: Choose a blog post title from our list or create your own.
features.step2: Generate a complete blog post with engaging content tailored to your keyword.
features.step3: Publish or save it as a draft directly in your CMS with our seamless integration.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our AI Blog Generator
benefits.benefit1Description: Easily link your CMS, whether it's WordPress, Shopify, and many other platforms, to our tool. Publish or save blog posts directly without needing to manually upload content.
benefits.benefit2Description: Automate your content creation and publishing process with our AI-powered blog generator, eliminating the hours spent on writing, editing, and uploading posts. Focus on growing your business instead.
benefits.benefit3Description: No technical skills required. Simply choose your blog topic, generate content, and publish with one click—perfect for busy business owners and marketers.
benefits.benefit4Description: Cut down on content outsourcing and copywriter fees. With our AI-driven blog generation tool, you get high-quality, SEO-optimized posts at a fraction of the cost of traditional methods.

cta.title: Works with all CMS
cta.description: Experience the power of AI-powered blog generation and seamless CMS integration today

thankYou.title: Thank You for Your Request!
thankYou.description: We've received your request for a free AI-powered blog post. Our team will review your information and get back to you shortly with your custom article.
thankYou.step1Description: You'll receive a confirmation email within the next few minutes. Please check your spam folder if you don't see it in your inbox.
thankYou.step2Description: Our AI will generate a high-quality, SEO-optimized blog post based on your keyword and website information.
thankYou.step3Description: Within 24-48 hours, you'll receive your free blog post ready to publish on your website.

hero.title: Track Your SEO Rankings and Discover Growth Opportunities
hero.description: Monitor your website's performance with our powerful rank analyzer. Track keywords, discover opportunities, and watch your rankings grow with actionable insights from Google Search Console.

features.feature1Description: Track your keyword rankings across all positions. See which keywords are driving traffic and identify opportunities for improvement with data from Google Search Console.
features.feature1Point1: Comprehensive ranking data for all your keywords
features.feature1Point2: Track position changes and progress over time
features.feature2Description: Group your content into topic clusters and track performance by category. Understand which topics drive the most traffic and engagement.
features.feature2Point1: Automatic content grouping by topic and theme
features.feature2Point2: Track clicks and impressions per topic cluster
features.feature2Point3: Identify growing and decaying content areas
features.feature3Description: Find keywords where you're close to ranking on page one. Focus your efforts on the keywords that will drive the most impact.
features.feature3Point2: Track progress from page 2 to page 1
features.feature3Point3: Prioritize optimization efforts for maximum ROI

benefits.title: Make Data-Driven SEO Decisions
benefits.benefit1Description: Get reliable insights into your ranking performance powered by Google Search Console data. Track your progress and understand how your pages perform in search results.
benefits.benefit2Description: Monitor your SEO progress with historical data and trend analysis. See how your rankings improve month over month and measure the impact of your optimization efforts.
benefits.benefit3Description: Receive regular performance reports delivered straight to your inbox. Stay informed about your rankings without logging into the dashboard.
benefits.benefit4Description: Don't just see the data—understand what to do with it. Our analyzer provides clear recommendations on which pages to optimize for maximum impact.

cta.title: Ready to Track Your Rankings?
cta.description: Start monitoring your SEO performance today and discover opportunities to grow your organic traffic.

hero.title: AI-Powered SEO Recommendations That Work on Autopilot
hero.description: Get smart, automated SEO suggestions for your website. Approve with one click and watch your rankings improve—no technical skills required.

features.title: Comprehensive On-Page SEO Optimization
features.feature1Description: AI analyzes your pages and generates optimized meta titles and descriptions that improve click-through rates and search visibility.
features.feature1Point1: Auto-generated meta descriptions for missing pages
features.feature1Point2: Optimized title tags with target keywords
features.feature1Point3: Character count optimization for search results
features.feature2Description: Improve accessibility and image search rankings with AI-generated alt tags and image titles for all your website images.
features.feature2Point1: Descriptive alt tags for every image
features.feature3Description: Ensure proper heading hierarchy with automated detection of multiple H1 tags and suggestions for optimal content structure.
features.feature3Point1: Identify pages with multiple H1 tags
features.feature4Description: Strengthen your site structure with AI-powered internal link suggestions that connect related content and boost keyword rankings.

benefits.title: Why Choose AI Recommendations
benefits.benefit1Description: Review AI-generated recommendations and approve them with a single click. Changes are automatically applied to your website without any coding.
benefits.benefit2Description: Automate hours of manual SEO work. Our AI continuously monitors your site and delivers actionable recommendations 24/7.
benefits.benefit3Description: See measurable improvements in your search rankings. Our customers typically see a 6% improvement in on-page SEO within the first month.
benefits.benefit4Description: Your site is constantly analyzed for new optimization opportunities. Get recommendations as your content grows and evolves.
